text:
When I was a child it was said that no one was worthy enough to look him in the eyes, while I did it all the time, since, being objective he wasn't even my god at all.
"Her place in this world is in hell, along with the other demons as Sohee would have wanted."
"But she is not willing, Dokkaebi and you must accept that." Jeoseung interrupted and he looked at him frowningly.
"I don't want there to be a war between demons and reapers again, Dokkaebi." Umnyeong's calm voice was heard again, as he approached us.
All the other people in the place had disappeared and that's when I realized that we weren't even in the room, there was no one else there, just the four of us.
"This is complete stupidity." Dokkaebi said, looking at me again now. "You will regret the decision you have made, Shin Ryujin... You are a disgrace to our race."
trans:
Cuando era niño, se decía que nadie era digno de mirarlo a los ojos, mientras que yo lo hacía constantemente, porque, siendo objetivo, ni siquiera era mi dios.
"Su lugar en este mundo es en el infierno, junto con los demás demonios, como Sohee lo habría querido".
"Pero ella no quiere, Dokkaebi, y debes aceptarlo". Jeoseung interrumpió y lo miró con el ceño fruncido.
"No quiero que se repita una guerra entre demonios y segadores, Dokkaebi". La voz serena de Umnyeong volvió a escucharse, mientras se acercaba a nosotros.
Toda la gente en el lugar había desaparecido y ahí fue cuando me di cuenta de que ni siquiera estábamos en la habitación, no había nadie más allí, solo nosotros cuatro.
"Esto es una completa estupidez", dijo Dokkaebi, mirándome otra vez. "Te arrepentirás de lo que has decidido, Shin Ryujin... Eres una deshonra para nuestra raza".
